conclusion: Analyze the graph to determine the relationship between terminal voltage and current for power source and resistor.
Graph with two lines: Line I (power source) and Line II (resistor). X-axis: current (A), Y-axis: voltage (V).
Identify intersection points: Line I intersects y-axis at 3 V, Line II intersects x-axis at 6 A.
Determine operating point: Intersection at (2 A, 2 V).
Calculate output power using formula \( P = U \times I \).
Verify calculated power matches standard answer.
The output power of the power source is 4 W.
